page.title: 07A DAY AT THE CARNIVAL
page.content:
{CHADDESDEN CARNIVAL}
I woke up at seven and had my breakfast, then made my way to Roe Farm Club. I helped to make our float because I was to be on it as a 'jail house rock' girl. This was ready by ten o'clock. Then I got ready and put on a flared skirt and a neckerchief. Then it was time to get on the float. I wasn't nervous but on the way it started to rain and I was absolutely freezing. When we got to{Chaddesden {Park}the judges decided on the best float. We didn't win despite all the hard work. After half an hour on the float we got changed for our gymnastics display which took place after lunch. I was nervous about the display, I had to do hoola-hooping. What a tiring day !
